body:
Instead of only allowing specs to be given as positional arguments, this change allows the user to give the spec via the path to a yaml file on disk, ala:

``` console
spack location --stage-dir -f /path/to/pkgconf.yaml
```

This is already possible in the `spack install ...` command, so hopefully it make sense here as well, and is easy to review.
title: Allow 'spack location' to take path to a spec.yaml file
